title: Nice well-located hotel in the heart of Beijing
text:
We stayed as a family in 2 rooms in the hotel in August 2016.
The Novotel Peace is a large modern hotel nicely situated in the heart of Beijing not too far from a main shopping area, Tianamen Square and the Forbidden City. Rooms are large, well laid out and contemporary. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was extensive with a wide range of western and oriental foods available.
Whilst we were there (Aug 2016) there was extensive building work going on at night replacing the pavement outside the hotel. This was outside the control of the hotel and they moved us to quieter rooms when we asked.
So overall a very nice friendly, well-appointed hotel.
